name: Cast Seals of the General Archives of the Kingdom
references: Collection de moulages de sceaux des Archives générales du Royaume
description: A collection of 19 casts of seals made by the General State Archives in Brussels.
Thousands of casts were made by the General State Archives in Brussels.
The original casts were made beginning in 1864.
It is unclear when these 19 casts were made as they likely are copies of the originals.
You can read more about this collection here.
